attributes.action: force an urgent review by OFT of BskyB Ltd under the Competition Act 1998
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: BskyB Ltd has recently been in the media for moves which can be viewed as uncompetitive. Firstly the 18% share holding of ITV Plc, when rival NTL Inc [now Virgin Media] where conceding bidding for ITV. ASA is currently looking into two count of BskyB using misleading advertising, which has promoted an Early Day Motion, number 935. BSkyB has withdrawn basic channels from Virgin Media, locking people out of content who subscribe and locked into a virgin media contact, forcing some customers to consider to change provider from Virgin Media to BskyB. We ask the Right Hon. Prime Minister, Tony Blair to consider asking/telling the Office of Fair Trading to look into BskyB Ltd and its practices urgently. We want to point out that Virgin Media customers would SkyOne Channel back. Thanks.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
